thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com | www.airportrentals.com
thread.title: Lynette Buurman

author: Lynette Buurman
title: Lynette Buurman
text: Given the impact of the Kaikoura earthquake we find ourselves in the situation of flying to Blenheim to visit our elderly parents in law who are in care. We are faced with a 6.5 hour drive now to travel from Kaikoura to Blenheim so the option of flying and picking up a rental car is the most cost effective and time efficient option for us. The service we received when picking up the vehicle was superb, quick, and informative. We will definitely use this option again for our next and subsequent visits.
